start.message: 👋 Hi {{name}}! Play Truth or Dare with your friends with various modes.

help.message: 🆘 Help Read this before contacting the developer. 🤖 Here's the list of available commands: /truth - Send a truth in the current chat. /dare - Send a dare in the current chat. /mode [classic|hot] - Choose the mode of the game /lang [en|it] - Change the language If you still need help you can contact Seba, the developer of the bot.

selector.message: 📯 Choose the mode of Truth or Dare Use the buttons below.
🏳️‍🌈 Select your language Use the buttons below.

privacy.message: 🔐 Privacy Policy What we store: • User ID and group ID: both provided by Telegram • Preferred language: provided by Telegram or selected by the user • Selected mode: selected by the user • Last change of settings What we use it for: • To personalize the services offered by the bot • To maintain the security and functionality of the bot
